dict.string:
This patches returns information about the user and his buddies on a given instant messaging service.
The information for the user is available as a structure on the "User Status" output containing her status as a string and as a number (0=Unknown, 1=Offline, 2=Idle, 3=Away, 4=Available) and, if available, her last name, first name and picture.
The list of buddies is available as a structure on the "Buddies Status" output. Each member of that structure is a structure itself describing information for one buddy in a similar way as for the user's information.
List of buddies on the selected IM service and their status.
